where TASKS_ID = #{tasksId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

TASKS_SCENARINO_ID = #{tasksScenarinoId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MODEL_ERROR_STATUS = #{modelErrorStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TASKS_SCENARINO_START_DATE = #{tasksScenarinoStartDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
TASKS_SCENARINO_END_DATE = #{tasksScenarinoEndDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
TASKS_RANGE_DAY = #{tasksRangeDay,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

PSAL = #{psal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SSAL = #{ssal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

BEIZHU3 = #{beizhu3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

TASKS_END_TIME = #{tasksEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

TASKS_EXPAND2 = #{tasksExpand2,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

where TASKS_SCENARINO_ID = #{tasksScenarinoId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select START_MODEL_RESULT from T_TASKS_STATUS where TASKS_SCENARINO_ID = #{tasksScenarinoId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.update: update T_TASKS_STATUS set BEIZHU2 = #{beizhu2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where TASKS_SCENARINO_ID = #{tasksScenarinoId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select TASKS_ID, TASKS_SCENARINO_ID, MODEL_ERROR_STATUS, A.TASKS_SCENARINO_START_DATE,A.TASKS_SCENARINO_END_DATE, A.TASKS_RANGE_DAY, STEPINDEX, TASKS_END_DATE, BEIZHU, BEIZHU2, BEIZHU3 from T_TASKS_STATUS A LEFT JOIN T_SCENARINO_DETAIL B ON A.TASKS_SCENARINO_ID=B.SCENARINO_ID WHERE B.PATH_DATE = #{pathdate} AND B.SCEN_TYPE=#{type} AND B.USER_ID=#{userId}
